instructions.name: buy
docs: Buy
Buy tokens
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The Anchor context holding the accounts
* `amount` - Amount of SOL buyer sells
* `min_amount_out` - Min amount of tokens expected to receive (slippage protection)

accounts.name: state
docs: The state account of each instance of this program

accounts.name: bonding_curve
docs: The state of the bonding curve that will be used during buys and sells

accounts.name: buyer_wsol_ata
docs: The ATA of the WSOL token that is owned by the buyer. Create one if no already exists

accounts.name: buyer_ata
docs: The ATA of the  token that is owned by the buyer. Create one if no already exists

instructions.name: create_tax_token
docs: CreateToken
Creates a new tax token
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The Anchor context holding the accounts
* `name` - The name of the token (used in the metadata account)
* `symbol` - The symbol of the token (used in the metadata account)
* `uri` - The uri of the token (used in the metadata account)
* `fee_bps` - Transfer fee BPS
* `max_fee` - Max fee that can be applied
* `curve_type` - The type of the curve. The numner defines the version e.g. CurveV1 then curve_type = 1

instructions.name: create_token
docs: CreateToken
Creates a new token
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The Anchor context holding the accounts
* `name` - The name of the token (used in the metadata account)
* `symbol` - The symbol of the token (used in the metadata account)
* `uri` - The uri of the token (used in the metadata account)
* `curve_type` - The type of the curve. The numner defines the version e.g. CurveV1 then curve_type = 1

accounts.name: state
docs: The state account of each instance of this program

accounts.name: token
docs: The Mint account of the newly created token.

accounts.name: curve_ata
docs: The ATA that will hold the liquidity of the curve (token side).

accounts.name: bonding_curve
docs: The state of the bonding curve that will be used during buys and sells

accounts.name: token_creator
docs: The user that is creating the token

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Initialize
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The Anchor context holding the accounts
* `treasury` - The treasury account that receives fees
* `protocol_fee` - Current protocol fees (fixed lamports amount). This is applied when the pool is created on Raydium
* `trade_fee_bps` - Current trade fees (BPS). This is applied on each trade that takes place. Fees collected in SOL
* `creator_fee` - Current creator fees (fixed lamports amount). This is applied when the pool is created on Raydium
* `total_token_supply` - The total supply of the newly created tokens in the lowest denomination i.e. decimals included

accounts.name: state
docs: The state account of each instance of this program

instructions.name: move_liquidity
docs: MoveLiquidity
Moves the liquidity to Raydium
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The Anchor context holding the accounts

accounts.name: bonding_curve

accounts.name: buyer_ata

accounts.name: buyer_wsol_ata
docs: The ATA of the WSOL token that is owned by the buyer. Create one if no already exists

instructions.name: sell
docs: Sell
Sell tokens
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The Anchor context holding the accounts
* `token_amount` - Amount of tokens seller sells
* `min_sol_amount_out` - Min amount of SOL expected to receive (slippage protection)

accounts.name: state
docs: The state account of each instance of this program

accounts.name: bonding_curve
docs: The state of the bonding curve that will be used during buys and sells

accounts.name: seller_ata
docs: The ATA of the  token that is owned by the seller. Create one if no already exists

fields.name: curve_type
docs: The type of the curve. This implement the main logic of the curve i.e. the formulas

fields.name: token_creator
docs: The creator of the token this bonding curve is associated with

fields.name: token
docs: The mint account of the token associated with this curve

fields.name: protocol_fee
docs: Current protocol fees (fixed lamports amount).. This is applied when the pool is created on Raydium

fields.name: trade_fee_bps
docs: Current trade fees (BPS). This is applied on each trade that takes place. Fees collected in SOL

fields.name: creator_fee
docs: Current creator fees (fixed lamports amount). This is applied when the pool is created on Raydium

fields.name: circulating_supply
docs: Current circulating supply of the token in the lowest denomination i.e. decimals included

fields.name: total_supply
docs: The total supply of the newly created tokens in the lowest denomination i.e. decimals included

fields.name: reserve_token_balance
docs: The balance of reserve token i.e. SOL in the lowest denomination (lamport) i.e. decimals included

fields.name: price
docs: The current price of the curve in lamports

fields.name: bump
docs: The PDA bump of this account

fields.name: closed
docs: Is this pool closed? Closed means sol target reached

fields.name: owner
docs: The owner that can handle various admin related teasks

fields.name: treasury
docs: The treasury account that receives fees

fields.name: protocol_fee
docs: Current protocol fees (fixed lamports amount). This is applied when the pool is created on Raydium

fields.name: trade_fee_bps
docs: Current trade fees (BPS). This is applied on each trade that takes place. Fees collected in SOL

fields.name: creator_fee
docs: Current creator fees (fixed lamports amount). This is applied when the pool is created on Raydium

fields.name: total_token_supply
docs: The total supply of the newly created tokens in the lowest denomination i.e. decimals included
